cisa.gov.shortDescription: Adobe Commerce and Magento Open Source contain an improper input validation vulnerability which can allow for arbitrary code execution.
cisa.gov.vulnerabilityName: Adobe Commerce and Magento Open Source Improper Input Validation Vulnerability

description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.
